name: Wizard's Chest
description:
In this game you have 60 seconds to place items in the Wizard's Chest while trying to not fill it up too quickly. Make combinations to preserve space but to also get points! Good luck and have fun playing my game!

Made in 3 hours for Trijam

Art Assets were pre made by me

Font: Lemon Days by Khurasan

Sound Assets:

  • Glass Break by JanevdMerwe1995
  • Fantasy Music Track by Migfus20
